Text.val: 12.11.2007 SH SCR13111 Added test in INVU_AMOUNT <> 0 and INVU_FINALPAYMENTDATE is null
31.01.2007 SH SCR12271 Added 2 new output parameters for BAD216
11.01.2007 AK SCR12147 removed Unix char from SQL query
28.12.2006 AK SCR12144 use sum markcode =59 for PI.AMOUNT
20.12.2006 AK SCR12147 change the range condition in 'SelectionInviceUnbooked'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select cast (sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2))
from :1/invo
where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_MARKCODETEXT<> 59
